adHeader: Watermark creation for photos, videos and documents
adDetails: I will create a watermark with your company name, your name or image . This can be used in Word Documents and Photographs to protect your work. SUPPORT will also give you tips on how to embed it on your photo or document. OR can I create a watermark for you and imbed it in 3 of your images. COST :$5 for watermark from your name, signature, or logo. (Logo's have to be analyzed first to see effectiveness as Watermarks) $20 : Create the watermark and imbed into 50 page document or on 50 photographs Contact : http://www.alocstudios.com/contactus.htm
